content:
House rules

    • Emphasis on the idea, intent and thought
    • Emphasis on context to extract the meaning
    • Use of common sense
    • Offensive and violent
    • Intolerance
    • An ill-intent aggravates an offense
    • Content quality and verifiability over authority or prominence
contentPreview:
HOUSE RULES







 * Emphasis on the idea, intent and thought
 * Emphasis on context to extract the meaning
 * Use of common sense
 * Offensive and violent
   
 * Intolerance
   
 * An ill-intent aggravates an offense
   
 * Content quality and verifiability...
title: Basic rules
